article_title: Palestinians sheltering in Rafah fear Israeli offensive
sentence: The  EU's  foreign  policy  chief  Josep  Borrell,  on  Monday  urged  allies  of  Israel  to  stop  sending  weapons,  as  "too  many  people"  were  being  killed  in  Gaza.

article_title: Palestinians sheltering in Rafah fear Israeli offensive
sentence: The  Israeli  military  launched  a  large-scale  air  and  ground  campaign  in  Gaza  after  Hamas  gunmen  killed  more  than  1,200  people  in  southern  Israel  on  7  October  and  took  253  other  people  hostage.

article_title: Palestinians sheltering in Rafah fear Israeli offensive
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  more  than  28,100  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  the  fighting  since  then.

article_title: Palestinians sheltering in Rafah fear Israeli offensive
sentence: The  Hamas-run  Palestinian  health  ministry  said  at  least  67  people  had  been  killed  in  the  Israeli  strikes  and  hostage  rescue  raid  in  Rafah  overnight.
